question: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022?
raw_answer: Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Malibu Park Drainage Improvement, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure.
evidence_answer: Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure, Vehicle Protection Devices

Outdoor Warning Sirens (FEMA Project)

(cid:190) Updates: This project will be funded through a grant from FEMA after the
Wooley Fire.

The remaining items includes
final paving, striping, irrigation, painting, planting material, clean-up,
and final detailing.
(cid:131) Project is out to bid with bids due April 21, 2021.

The project consists of hiring a consultant to develop a plan that
includes the evaluation of a siren system and possible locations.

While being
open, many project related items will continue. This will include
intermittent traffic control (lane closures).
(cid:131) Staff is rescheduling the community meeting to May 2021.

(cid:131) The project assessment engineer has begun the process of evaluating

the project costs.

Staff is
working on an RFQ to hire a consultant for the design.
